author: Mallika Mitra
title: Best Buy kicks off holiday season hiring with fairs across the country
description: Best Buy said it plans to hire thousands of workers this holiday season through hiring fairs across the country.
content:
As the holidays approach, Best Buy has kicked off its seasonal hiring by hosting a number of job fairs.
